Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Olimar II in Cambrils, you'll be near the beach and minutes from Cambrils Beach. This family-friendly aparthotel is within the vicinity of Ponent Beach and Levante Beach.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 148 guestrooms, featuring kitchens with refrigerators and microwaves. Rooms have private balconies. 36-inch LED televisions with cable programming provide entertainment, while wireless Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected. Conveniences include sofa beds, housekeeping is provided daily, and cribs/infant beds (surcharge) can be requested.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Don't miss out on the many recreational opportunities, including an outdoor pool, an indoor pool, and bicycles to rent. Additional amenities include complimentary wireless Internet access, an arcade/game room, and a television in the lobby.

Dining
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Olimar II. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include express check-in, express check-out, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby. Guests may use a roundtrip airport shuttle for a surcharge, and self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 1 PM Check-out time is 10 AM
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Olimar II. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Cambrils Beach - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Ponent Beach - 5.7 km / 3.6 mi
Levante Beach - 6.8 km / 4.2 mi
Capellans Beach - 7.6 km / 4.7 mi
PortAventura - 8.2 km / 5.1 mi

Aquopolis Costa Dorada - 10.2 km / 6.3 mi
Carrefour Commercial Center - 14.1 km / 8.8 mi

Central Park Shopping Center - 16.2 km / 10.1 mi

Plaza de Toros - 16.5 km / 10.3 mi
Plaza Imperial Tarraco - 16.7 km / 10.4 mi
Tarraco Roman Theater - 16.8 km / 10.5 mi

The nearest airports are:
Reus (REU) - 11.9 km / 7.4 mi
Barcelona (BCN-Barcelona Intl.) - 89.2 km / 55.4 mi

The preferred airport for Olimar II is Barcelona (BCN-Barcelona Intl.).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Olimar II Aparthotel is Barcelona (BCN-Barcelona Intl.) - 89.2 km / 55.4 mi.
